name: ORD_AUD_MAMMO_HORMONES_2
description: This table contains the audit history for the deprecated order mammo hormone history.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HORMONES_END_DATE
columns.description: Audit of hormone end dates relevant to breast imaging exams captured in the hormone history navigator. This column has values delimited by "^". The source item is located at MAMMO_HORMONES.END_DATE.

columns.name: HORMONES_START_DATE
columns.description: Audit of hormone start dates relevant to breast imaging exams captured in the hormone history navigator. This column has values delimited by "^". The source item is located at MAMMO_HORMONES.START_DATE.
